attributes.action: petition HM the Queen to strip the Peerage bestowed on Peter MANDELSON and publically denounce cronyism.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cronyism is what makes British politics more loathsome than paedophilia.  Hardly a day, let alone a government, goes by without the repugnant practice of appointing friends and family to positions within Government or the creation of superfluous jobs / Departments to assist these deadbeat hangers-on to bleed the poor ignored public dry.
It is about time that those persons charged with the well-being of the Nation take their responsibilities seriously and stop pimping their position in society in an attempt to secure favour from recidivists

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
